articles.content: Apple is now sending out emails to let developers know if they've been selected to attend the special WWDC viewing event that will be held on Monday, June 5 at the Apple Park campus in Cupertino, Cal… [+1338 chars]

articles.title: Millennia retools its downtown Cleveland Centennial project - Crain's Cleveland Business
articles.description: Once slated to hold more than 860 units of workforce housing, the historic Union Trust Building at East Ninth Street and Euclid Avenue now will house 413 such units. Market-rate apartments, a 170-room Curio by Hilton hotel and offices will fill much of the re…
